name: Modest Monk: Mystery Adventures
description:
Modest Monk : Mystery Adventure is an idea for game that does not obey common game logic of winning and losing.

As of now this game is under development, and was made for Wowie Jam 3.0

I couldn't build the game as I envisioned due to time constraints and Unity 2020 ver. bugs. I wanted to submit even if the game is unfinished.

I hope you guys have fun with this basic platformer, stay tuned for further development !!!

Assets Used:

GothicVania Church Pack

and a Huge Thanks to Brackeys
